Items.Name: Ministry of Higher Education Scholarships
Items.Details:
• Scholarships for postgraduate study abroad (Master's/PhD)
• Partnered with countries like Germany, Japan, and China
• Often fully funded (tuition, travel, and living expenses)

Items.Name: STDF (Science and Technology Development Fund)
Items.Details:
• Supports top-performing Egyptian students in science & engineering
• Focus on innovation and research

Items.Name: Tahya Misr Scholarships
Items.Details:
• For high-achieving students in public schools who cannot afford tuition
• Offers full tuition coverage at Egyptian private universities

Items.Name: The Presidential Scholarship for Excellence
Items.Details:
• Targets exceptional students in science, technology, and medicine
• Includes study opportunities abroad or in elite national programs

Items.Name: Al-Azhar Scholarships
Items.Details:
• Offered to Egyptian and international students
• Covers Islamic studies and Arabic language programs
• Includes tuition, housing, and monthly stipend

Items.Name: American University in Cairo (AUC)
Items.Details:
• Need-based and merit scholarships
• “Leadership for Education and Development” (LEAD) program
• Covers full tuition + housing + monthly stipend

Items.Name: German University in Cairo (GUC)
Items.Details: • Offers partial to full scholarships for top Thanaweya Amma and IG students

Items.Name: British University in Egypt (BUE)
Items.Details: • Offers academic excellence scholarships

Items.Name: Nile University
Items.Details: • Provides full and partial scholarships for engineering, IT, and business students

Items.Name: Zewail City of Science and Technology
Items.Details: • Offers full scholarships for top science students

Items.Name: Future University, MSA, October 6 University
Items.Details: • Many private universities offer discounts and scholarships for top scorers or siblings

Items.Name: USAID Egyptian Pioneers Program
Items.Details: • Full scholarships for undergraduate and postgraduate studies in Egypt or the U.S.

Items.Name: DAAD (Germany)
Items.Details: • Scholarships for Egyptian graduates to study Master's/PhD in Germany

Items.Name: Fulbright (USA)
Items.Details: • For postgraduate studies and cultural exchange

Items.Name: Chevening (UK)
Items.Details: • Full scholarships for 1-year Master's degrees in the UK

Items.Name: Japanese Government (MEXT)
Items.Details: • For undergraduate and graduate study in Japan

Items.Name: Erasmus+ (EU)
Items.Details: • Exchange programs and Master's scholarships in Europe

Items.Name: Misr El-Kheir Foundation
Items.Details:
• Scholarships for underprivileged high-achievers
• Covers fees, housing, and personal expenses

Items.Name: Sawiris Foundation
Items.Details:
• Full scholarships to AUC, Nile University, and study abroad
• Includes entrepreneurship and STEM focus

Items.Name: Egyptian Banks (like Banque Misr)
Items.Details: • Scholarships for students in business, IT, and finance
